issue.title: Remove `URL` taking factory methods of `JsonFactory` (3.0)

repository.name: jackson-core
repository.description: Core part of Jackson that defines Streaming API as well as basic shared abstractions

issue.body:
(note: continuation of #1462)

Assuming #1462 is done and we have time, let's remove now-deprecated method(s):

```
    public abstract JsonParser createParser(URL url);
```

from Jackson 3.0.

repository.name: jackson-core
repository.description: Core part of Jackson that defines Streaming API as well as basic shared abstractions

issue.title: Deprecate `URL`-taking `readValue()` methods in `ObjectMapper`, `ObjectReader`

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.body: With https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-core/issues/1462 `URL`-taking factory method of `JsonFactory` will be deprecated, so we need to do the same for higher level `readValue()` methods of `ObjectMapper` and `ObjectReader`.

issue.title: deprecate methods that take URL inputs

repository.name: jackson-module-scala
repository.description: Add-on module for Jackson (https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson) to support Scala-specific datatypes

issue.title: Remove deprecated `URL`-taking `readValue()` methods in `ObjectMapper`, `ObjectReader` from 3.0

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.body:
(follow-up to #5257) 

Since these methods were deprecated in 2.20, drop from 3.0, see #5257 and https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-core/issues/1462 for more background on why these methods are not good to expose.

issue.title: Improve handling of URL-backed `InputStream`s, closing
